sentences: Makhri Pirkuliyeva; born 11 March 1988), commonly known as Mahri or Mähri (Russian: Махри, tr. Makhri), and often known by her stage name Myahri, Mýahri, or Mýähri (Russian: Мяхри, tr. Myakhri), is a Turkmen hip-hop singer.
She studied at Ashgabat Turkish Anatolian High School (Turkmen: Aşgabat türk Anadoly orta mekdebi; Turkish: Aşkabat Türk Anadolu Lisesi; Russian: Ашхабадская турецкая анатолийская средняя школа, tr.
In 2007, she cooperated with the producer Nikolay Yakimov (Turkmen: Nikolaý Ýakimow; Russian: Николай Якимов) for the release of album Seňki däl.
However Mähri remains best known for her song Aýterek Günterek ("The Moon Tree and the Sun Tree").
